entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain. Amounts may approach warning criteria or possibly exceed them, especially about North Canterbury and the Kaikoura District. Note, precipitation may fall as snow above about 1200 metres in Canterbury Tuesday afternoon and evening. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: The chance of upgrade has been decreased to Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 80 to 110 mm of rain, especially about the ranges. Peaks rates of 25 to 40 mm/h likely in localised downpours Tuesday morning, with thunderstorms also possible. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.
